name: Find A Way
description:
Find a Way is a game with elements of survival and saspens.
This is a unique adventure 2D horror immersing you in the eerie atmosphere of lonely streets and dark corridors.
Due to unknown and strange circumstances, the main character found himself in a forgotten place, the environment of which is filled with danger and saturated with fear.
Where will Matthew's hundreds of doors that appear literally everywhere lead Matthew? In a chateau, long corridors, or picturesque forests... As if a living organism, each location conceals its own history.
Before you is a world consisting of intertwined pieces of light and darkness, hundreds of doors and hostile manifestations of horror that want to end your life.
Explore the world around you and collect the necessary resources to survive.
Hurry! Don't hesitate! Every second can cost you your life...
Light is your friend! Light is your only weapon in the fight against fear!
Overcome all obstacles and find a way out or adapt and survive.
